origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CostControlAPI.analyze_costs', 'description': 'This function analyzes the cost data of the company departments and compares it with industry average costs to provide optimization suggestions.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'department', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The department(s) to analyze, e.g., all, sales, production.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry sector of the company, e.g., manufacturing, services.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_report', 'description': 'The detailed cost analysis report including comparisons and optimization suggestions.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CostControlAPI.analyze_costs, 它的参数输入如下: 'department'是'all', 'industry'是'manufacturing'.
